text: int main ( ) { int n , t , i , j , k , max , sum , key , num [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , loc ; int answer [ 100 ] ; int flag ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; max = 0 ; sum = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { if ( k <= j ) scanf ( "%d" , & num [ j ] [ k ] ) ; else num [ j ] [ k ] = 0 ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( num [ n - 1 ] [ j ] >= max ) { key = 0 ; max = num [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ; loc = j ; if ( loc == n - 1 ) key = 1 ; } } sum = sum + max ; for ( j = n - 2 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { if ( key == 1 ) sum += num [ j ] [ -- loc ] ; else { if ( num [ j ] [ loc ] > num [ j ] [ loc - 1 ] ) sum += num [ j ] [ loc ] ; else { sum += num [ j ] [ loc - 1 ] ; loc = loc - 1 ; } } } answer [ i ] = sum ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) printf ( "%d\n" , answer [ i ] ) ; return 0 ; }
